definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: I am enclosing my resume together with my photo, and I believe that they may be found satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 兹随函附履历表及照片一份，希望阁下能够满意。

sentences.english: David Edmondson resigned following questions about his resume's accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 大卫艾蒙森不愿就其履历表准确性的问题作任何回应。

sentences.english: Now it’s just a résumé item.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在，这只是履历表中的一个栏目。

sentences.english: A: Well, I’ve looked over your resume, Mr. Peepers.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我看过了你的履历表，皮伯斯先生。

sentences.english: In that case may I drop off my resume at your office for future reference and possibly see you for a few minutes?
sentences.chinese: 那么我可不可以留下一份履历表供你们参考？

sentences.english: Our rates are very fair and we have many biodata ready for your immediate selection.
sentences.chinese: 我们的收费廉宜并且拥有大量的履历表让您选择。

sentences.english: Does your resume need new acronyms?
sentences.chinese: 履历表是否需要新的首字母缩写。

sentences.english: Please send in your resume with your application form.
sentences.chinese: 请缴送申请表格时一并附上履历表。

sentences.english: I'd like to send my resume.
sentences.chinese: 我想要把我的履历表寄去。

sentences.english: The attached résumé details my qualifications and experience in the business.
sentences.chinese: 附上的履历表就本人的能力及经验都已详加说明。

sentences.english: After I write the letter and resume, will you please proofread and polish them?
sentences.chinese: 我写了信和履历表后，可否请你修饰一下呢？

sentences.english: When you greet the interviewer, offer a copy of your resume.
sentences.chinese: 当你与面试者照面，提供一份你的履历表。

sentences.english: Any question, please don't hesitate to tell us.
sentences.chinese: 意者请寄履历表与作品集给我们。

sentences.english: This is a very impressive resume, Mr. Smith.
sentences.chinese: 你的履历表给人印象深刻，史密斯先生。

sentences.english: I have receive your letter and your resume.
sentences.chinese: 我已经收了您的求职信和履历表。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
